Recology

An exploration of using R for ecology, evolution, and open science.

  1. @drewconway interview on @DataNoBorders at the Strata conference

    The O'Reilly Media Strata Summit has many interviews on YouTube (just search YouTube for it)

    Drew Conway is the author of a R packages, including infochimps, an R wrapper to the Infochimps API service.

    The YouTube video:


    Thursday, September 22 Read Later

  2. Key questions in pollination ecology - graphic

    A recent paper in the Journal of Pollination Ecology conducted a survey of pollination ecologists and they compiled out of this survey key areas to be addressed, and specific questions within those areas to be pursued.

    I made a google visualization of these questions, which I hope will give pollination biologists an easy graphical way to visualize these questions.


    The graphic:


    The code:


    Ref
    Mayer, C., Adler, L., Armbruster, Scott, Dafni, A., Eardley, C., Huang, S., Kevan, P., Ollerton, J., Packer, L. and Ssymank, A. (2011) Pollination ecology in the 21st century: key questions for future research. Journal of Pollination Ecology, 3 (2). pp. 8-23. ISSN 1920-7603

    Wednesday, September 21 Read Later
